Chat - Error Not In Eureka.message: You are not in Eureka, this command is unavailable.

Chat - New Chest Found.message: You've found a new chest location

Chat - New Chest Found Dev Note.message: Please consider sending the following information to the developer:

Chat - New Chest Found Feedback.message: (Please do not use the feedback function to send this)

Chat - Error Map Markers.message: Unable to place all markers on map

Chat - Error Minimap Markers.message: Unable to place all markers on minimap

Chat - Error Fairy Markers.message: Tracking for fairies needs to be reset, please go to all listed locations to update.

Chat - Error Fairy Map Markers.message: Unable to place fairy markers on map

Chat - Error Fairy Minimap Markers.message: Unable to place fairy markers on minimap

QuestLog - Anemos 1 Tip 1.message: You must obtain a Protean Crystal from a normal monster.

QuestLog - Anemos 1 Tip 2.message: You cannot exchange Anemos Crystals for Protean Crystals until you finish this quest.

QuestLog - Anemos 3 Step 2.message: Proceed inside the Early Natural History Society Observatory and interact with the Confluence

QuestLog - Anemos 3 Tip 1.message: Mobs will spawn around and inside the building during nighttime and as such it is recommended to do this during daytime (6am to 6pm ET).

QuestLog - Anemos 5 Step 2.message: Proceed to the The Orchard below the cliff and interact with the Confluence

QuestLog - Anemos 13 Step 2.message: Proceed to the The Val River Swale near the waterfall and interact with the Confluence

QuestLog - Anemos 17 Step 2.message: Proceed to the Uncanny Valley and interact with the Confluence

QuestLog - Anemos 17 Step 4.message: Proceed to the Aethernet Control and interact with the Aethernet Relay

QuestLog - Anemos 17 Step 5.message: Interact with the Aethernet Relay again and trade in 99 Anemos Crystals.

QuestLog - Pagos 21 Step 2.message: Locate the Depleted Aetherial Stream at The Cones (upper level on a raised grassy hill)

QuestLog - Pagos 23 Step 2.message: Locate the Depleted Aetherial Stream at The Val River Belly

QuestLog - Pagos 25 Step 2.message: Locate the magicite at The Eastern Edge

QuestLog - Pagos 25 Step 3.message: Interact with it again in almost the same location

QuestLog - Pagos 25 Tip 1.message: You can also speak with Gerolt any time after first speaking to Krile to unlock Eureka Pagos weapon enhancement.

QuestLog - Pagos 35 Step 2.message: Locate the aether column at The Fumarole

QuestLog - Pyros 35 Step 2.message: Proceed to The Living Foundry and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Pyros 35 Step 5.message: Use the Logos Manipulator and select the Paralyze L logogram and extract the mneme

QuestLog - Pyros 35 Step 7.message: Proceed to Northeastern Ice Needles and interact with the confluence

QuestLog - Pyros 38 Step 2.message: Proceed to The Surgate Town House and interact with the Promising Scrap

QuestLog - Pyros 38 Step 4.message: Proceed to The Firing Chamber and interact with the confluence

QuestLog - Pyros 38 Tip 1.message: This quest unlocks additional capacity for the logos manipulator.

QuestLog - Pyros 40 Step 2.message: Proceed to West Flamerock and interact with the confluence

QuestLog - Pyros 45 Step 1.message: Talk to Krile (a few cutscenes will play)

QuestLog - Pyros 45 Step 2.message: Proceed to The Living Foundry and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Pyros 50 Step 2.message: Proceed to East Flamerock and interact with the confluence

QuestLog - Pyros 50 Step 4.message: Proceed to The Cavern of the Second Cant and interact with the confluence

QuestLog - Hydatos 51 Step 2.message: Proceed to The Central Columns and talk again to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 51 Step 3.message: Proceed south to The Val River Source and find the Pooled Aether

QuestLog - Hydatos 51 Step 4.message: Return to the The Central Columns and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 54 Step 2.message: Proceed to The Western Columns and talk again to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 54 Step 3.message: Proceed to The West Val River Bank

QuestLog - Hydatos 54 Step 4.message: Walk up the large column to find the Pooled Aether

QuestLog - Hydatos 54 Step 5.message: Return to The Western Columns and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 57 Step 1.message: Talk to Krile at the The Western Columns

QuestLog - Hydatos 57 Step 2.message: Proceed east to The Eastern Columns and talk to Krile again

QuestLog - Hydatos 57 Step 3.message: Head north to The East Val River Bank to find the Pooled Aether

QuestLog - Hydatos 57 Step 4.message: Return to The Eastern Columns and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 1.message: Head to The Eastern Columns and talk to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 2.message: Head to The Aetherbridge Foundation and talk again to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 3.message: Proceed into the Headquarters Entrance (Teleport next to you)

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 5.message: Go in the Board Room and talk again to Krile

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 7.message: Talk again to Krile (a few cutscenes will play)

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 8.message: Choose between Krile's path (sealing) or that of Ejika Tsunjika (destruction)

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Step 9.message: Return to Central Point and talk to Ejika Tsunjika or Krile (opposite you picked)

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Tip 1.message: This quest unlocks The Baldesion Arsenal.

QuestLog - Hydatos 60 Tip 2.message: Speak with the Expedition Scholar after finishing this quest.

Log - Wrong Tab.message: Please open your challenge log in the 'Other' category.

Config Tooltip - Show PT.message: Disabling this option will remove time element from the shout message.

Config Tooltip - Coffer Icons.message: Adds the coffer locations on entry of eureka.

Config Tooltip - Bunny Low Level Fates.message: Only shows the low level bunny fates for Pagos and Pyros.

Config Tooltip - Draw Circle.message: Draws a circle if the player is near a coffer location.

Shout Window - Limit.message: Shout will be available 20s after spawn.
